title: Layout Grid
summary: The layout grid object (.o-layout-grid) provides a flexible CSS grid system with responsive and container query support.

description.main: Use .o-layout-grid to create grid layouts. Modifiers allow you to control columns, gaps, spans, and alignment responsively or with container queries.

containerQuery.title: Container Query Support
containerQuery.description: Enable container query support by adding the .o-layout-grid--cq modifier to the grid container. This is needed to use container query based modifiers.

o-layout-grid--cq.description: Enables container query support (container-type: inline-size; container-name: layout-grid;).

span.title: Column and Row Span
span.description: Make grid items span multiple columns or rows using the span modifiers.

o-layout-grid--col-span-{n}.description: Make an item span n columns.

o-layout-grid--row-span-{n}.description: Make an item span n rows.

columns.title: Number of Columns
columns.description: Set the number of columns in the layout grid.

order.title: Order
order.description: Control the order of grid items.

o-layout-grid--order-{n}.description: Set the order of an item.

gap.title: Gap
gap.description: Available gap settings in the layout grid

o-layout-grid--gap-{n}.description: Set the gap between grid items.

justify.title: Justify Placement
justify.description: Control horizontal alignment of grid items.

o-layout-grid--justify-start.description: Align an item to the start horizontally (justify-self: start).

o-layout-grid--justify-center.description: Align an item to the center horizontally (justify-self: center).

o-layout-grid--justify-end.description: Align an item to the end horizontally (justify-self: end).

align.title: Align Placement
align.description: Control vertical alignment of grid items.

o-layout-grid--align-start.description: Align an item to the start vertically (align-self: start).

o-layout-grid--align-center.description: Align an item to the center vertically (align-self: center).

o-layout-grid--align-end.description: Align an item to the end vertically (align-self: end).

autoRows.title: Auto Rows
autoRows.description: Set the grid-auto-rows property for the layout grid.
